website_summaries.verdict: An extremely likeable iPod system, with a superb build and great sound quality considering the price. It's ideal for students and wouldn't be out of place in a bedroom. It's no hi-fi alternative, but for £100 it's very good indeed
pros: S-Video output for older video-enabled iPods
cons: Video output not compatible with iPhone and 6th-gen video iPods

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SOUND for the price and size. However, it is the older (large) Apple style plug. Having a new phone iPhone means this product only works via aux cable. Also, remember: no batteries, no bluetooth, no time display. However, I was looking for something uncomplicated and simple with good sound. This has very good sound - mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she can listen to her iPod on it. We were very impressed with the sound quality, the bass was fairly decent too. Had no problems with it so far and it gets quite a bit of use. The sound carries to all rooms of our apartment nicely and theres no 'tinniness' to the treble. I highly recommend this system, the price is affordable without comprimising much on the sound quality. Sure there are many high-end docks out there for much higher prices but save those for the 'purists'. Save your money and get this instead, you should be as satisfied with it as we are.
customer_reviews.author: Stroppy1

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SOUND.. PRICE DROP!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the price of this unit now! I paid $150.00 and it was that price for years. I went to do the review and noticed they dropped the price. BUY THIS UNIT. This is a great sounding docking station.. It's the BEST one I have ever used. I have another one but the sound doesn't come close to this. Remote works ok.. kind of slow at times.. but that's no big deal.. the main reason is sound.. and you crank this little bugger up and it rocks~ takes the place of an entire home stereo system... but I have that too.. and don't use it now
customer_reviews.author: B. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say that, for the price, I have heard a better unit. Hey, it's Klipsch, isn't it? Sound is great for the size. Really, this is a very small unit. Look at the image in scale to the iPod. But it has a great sound and will fill a room. I have only used indoors, so I cannot comment on patio/poolside use. The remote is intuitive and nice to have, since it is only an AC powered unit (no battery option here). It charges my iPhone 4 and works with my 120GB iPod. Had one of these stolen from my shelf at work recently, and had to buy another. What else can one say?
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Linville

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for a bedside iPhone dock for some time. I tried the iHome models and two from Philips, all with one issue or another. This unit is the charmer. Granted it is a bit more expensive than some other and unfortunately does not have an analog clock, the sound, look and feel is great. It is sturdy and well-constructed. My iPhone 4 sits in the dock without having to remove the case (I have a minimal case, I'm not sure if an Otter would work). This is a nice size unit for bedside, while still delivering high fidelity sound. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: MasterMarquette

customer_reviews.title: Great but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my expectations were too high, but while this sounds very good, I was expecting a little bit more. Granted, I haven't compared it head-to-head with the Bose speakers, the other ones that I was considering buying, but it doesn't seem to have the same depth of bass or clarity. Maybe it's the quality of my MP3s but I am slightly disappointed. Nevertheless, it is a vast improvement over the $50 cheapie portable speakers I was using before and I think the price is right. It works nicely in my kitchen, but I probably would want something more substantial for a much larger room.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good thing, small package!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this one's tough to beat. The sound is terrific for a unit so small. The power is decent, not the type that's going to punch a hole in your chest when you crank the volume, but that shouldn't be your goal when considering this type of unit anyway. It's better then the iHome, the Memorex, and even the Bose at this price. The Bose is double the price, and I don't think it's worth it when compared to the iGroove. If you're looking for a compact device that delivers great sound for a great price, you needn't look any further.
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Cannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: Solid sound, deceiving size
customer_reviews.text: Totally satisfied with it. I don't settle easily when it comes to audio. Having put together a punchy, multi room rig at home, I was skeptical when I started looking for a small unit that I can have in my office. I've have been pretty seriously disappointed in the past (including with the Bose Wave). I was thrilled with the sound of this little unit. Klipsch has done it right. The base is room filling and the highs are great too. I still can't get over the size; very portable. It works just fine with my iPhone 4. Everything just works as you would expect it to. I have just ordered another for a smaller room at home.
customer_reviews.author: shamazon

customer_reviews.title: Flexible
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant little device if one doesn't mind being 'wired'. The sound is full; bright and adequately bassy in such a compact package. Newer gen iPhones will need an adapter to dock in the 30-pin slot-beware of that! I now use this as my primary PC speaker thru the handy AUX input round back, but will also take it on road trips, to the garage etc., it's that portable.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McDilda

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap, but still worth it
customer_reviews.text: It's actually a lot smaller than I imagined, but puts out very clean sound, and it can get cranked up without degrading. iPhone nestles nicely in the recess. Remote simple but effective. Could use a little more status feedback. And it would have been so easy to put an alarm clock in it, but didn't. Will have to check how it handles alarm clock app. But I still like it. Definitely superior to Altec Lansing's offerings. Satisfying purchase. (was $100 in Gold Box deal)
customer_reviews.author: ©ooper

customer_reviews.title: A blast from a big name of the past.
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch is a very old name in loud-speakers. Back in the day, they were the envy of anyone wanting the best for their Hi-Fi. I bought this item because of the reputation I grew up hearing about. I could not believe the sound that filled my house when I set this unit on the ledge between my kitchen and family room. AWESOME!!! So Clear, So Rich. I have heard similar items by other companies ....no contest!!! Well done, Klipsch!!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnP

customer_reviews.title: i pod dock
customer_reviews.text: I have owned, for variious reasons, 3 I pod docks that did not work to my satisfaction. When I saw this dock advertized on Amazon, just the style alone makes it appealing. There is not one feature that I don't like, and I feel the design is such that you notice the sleek look of the dock before you realize an i pod is in it. All of my others featured the i pod, the dock just supplied the music. I think this is one of the best choices that I have made when purchasing from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: flo stengel

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I've got my iPod Classic plugged into this and its working very well. The sound is very good and there haven't been any sort of mechanical issues yet. No loose connections.
customer_reviews.author: rbgilbert

customer_reviews.title: The reviews rated it as one of the better sounding units and I would agree
customer_reviews.text: The reviews rated it as one of the better sounding units and I would agree. I use it in a bedroom and it has pretty good sound and volume. Reviews also said the remote was pretty bad. They under sold that, the remote is quite bad but if you hold it just right, pointing it direclty at the unit it works ok most of the time. Otherwise I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Sound From A Small Speaker System
customer_reviews.text: When I played my first song on this small speaker system, all I could think of was "Wow". The reviews I read that praised the sound quality were right on the mark. (I doubted the reviews but took a chance.) Although I rated the features one star, I expected this and it was not a problem: The system comes with three buttons: One increases the volume, a second decreases the volume, and a third turns the system on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald A. Delorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a moderately sized room (about 350 sq ft) and it really fills the room nicely for the price. Bass response is quite good for a small unit, and the mid and highs are pretty good, especially with some EQ tweaking in the iPod settings. The remote is a little finicky at times and doesn't always respond right away, but it's a minor complaint. Overall a good value over the Bose system if you're not seeking the ultimate in audiophile quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, pretty good sound.
customer_reviews.text: I've read reviews complaining about the sound quality and the reliability of this unit. I've had mine for two years, in almost daily use with ipod touch 3rd and 4th generations. I've never had a problem. The sound quality is not the best, but it is plenty good for casual listening. It's not what I use in my living room, but I keep one in the kitchen and I'm buying a second for the bedroom. For the money, it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Footnote

customer_reviews.title: Great player
customer_reviews.text: I got this player so I could play music directly from my iphone. Initially I wanted to be able to have music blasting in the kitchen while I prepared Thanksgiving dinner. The player works great and it's light and very portable. I can set it up effortlessly in any room in the house and listen to music. When everyone in my family went digital the only way I listened to music was through ear buds and I missed being able to fill a room with my favorite sounds. Now I can. It's an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Kurland

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Unit
customer_reviews.text: I had heard the Klipsch iGrove SXT Speaker, a year ago, when I was looking around in Best Buy. I didn't think there was anything to compare with it other than the Bose. Two weeks ago I bought one from Amazon and I couldn't be more pleased. Great sound from a remarkably small package. Klipsch has been a high quality brand for decades and their innovations in sound reproduction are truly inspired. If you are looking for an iPod/Phone/Pad/Poodle docking speaker, the iGrove SXT is certainly one of the very best and a great value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who are not familiar with Klipsch products, you should get to know them as soon as you can. In my opinion, Klipsch makes one of the best audio products on the market today. I actually like their speakers better than Bose. I am not interested in writing a great review, only an honest one, and I can sum up my rating with 3 words......... It's a Klipsch.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenspeaks

customer_reviews.title: Great little iphone radio!
customer_reviews.text: When i first got this radio, i was replacing a Mirage Omnivibe that i paid $400.00 for originally. The Omnivibe was not compatible for my iphone, but it would work great....until the amp burned out from using the iphone that wasnt compatible! At first i thought this Klipsch radio didnt sound that great compared to the Mirage...but then i remembered the price difference between the 2. So i gave a week or 2 and it seemed to start growing on me more and more. Now i love this radio! It will really rock for a radio that is as small is this really is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: compact and great sounding
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -small footprint -solidly built -great sound for the size, perfect for a bedside speaker, and can capably fill a small room -fantastic design for cradling the iphone 3gs (it supports the phone very securely, the back of the phone rests against the back support, and also it docks with the iphone case on) Cons: -plastic feels a little cheap -a little pricy -trebles could be cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, quircky remote
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I think this unit produces some great sound. Klipsch is reputable, and this product falls in line w/ that. However, my remote will only choose to work when it wants. Sometimes it does, sometimes it doesn't. Not a battery issue, b/c it happened w/ a new battery. This simple IR remote is built on simple & sound technology, not sure why mine fails to work, but disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Best for the price
customer_reviews.text: I went to the local big box store and listened to all the docking station options from Sony to Bose. I could find no difference between the Klipsch and Bose that would justify the price difference. I would have purchased then, but it was out of stock. I went to Amazon, ordered, paid less, it shipped for free and I received it in less than a week during the Christmas rush. Set up was simple and the sound quality continues to amaze despite the small size. The bottom line is that I'm fully satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: captken

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this product. It sounds great with good bass (for its size) and was inexpensive. Klipsch is a good brand to own for $135.00. It's small and portable and fits our iphone and ipod. Note that this product is not designed for newer ipod 5 and the connector will not fit. Great for kitchen stereo, office or desk.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker system, great price.
customer_reviews.text: This works terrific with the iphone 4S, and sounds great in a fairly large bedroom. The price is about 1/3 a Bose system. The small remote is helpful if you are in bed. Make no mistake, this is not a poor-sounding clock radio, but a full fledged stereo speaker system. It is convenient in that it charges the phone while it is in the dock. Took off one star for the need to add support behind the iphone, as others have commented. You can pick up the small clear cabinet bumpers at any hardware store, that do the trick perfectly when you stick them on the unit--it would be better if they were included in the box.
customer_reviews.author: lanenj

customer_reviews.title: Big sound
customer_reviews.text: This unit is smaller than what I thought it would be, but since it will be on an office desk that is a good thing. I plugged in an mp3 player through the aux in port on the back to test it while waiting for the iPod Touch to come in and it sounds pretty good for its size. It doesn't have a clock or a radio, but that isn't needed and keeps the look of the unit simple.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Spadowski

customer_reviews.title: Mindblowing sound
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the most difficult decision whether how worth it is going to be to buy a docker and when I decided I was in between Klipsch sxt or Bose sound dock. This is worth the money I spent. For the first time I am using Klipsch and I am very happy with this product. It produces very crisp and amazing sound from those two small speakers, it is playing well in the hall. I am using my touch and it has a video out as well. So you can watch videos/play music directly from youtube. Also the remote is very easy to use. I just loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Primetime

customer_reviews.title: More than meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a reasonable priced alternative to Bose, this is it. I bought it to play background music at my son and daughter-in-law's wedding vow renewal at our local church. I had it on a setting of between 3 and 4 and it filled the sanctuary with lovely melodies. I wanted to crank it up full volume but resisted the urge so the minister could be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Morningstar1957

customer_reviews.title: Very nice speaker system!
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for use in my office, with an IPhone 3G. I purchased it because I use Klipsch speakers for my home surround system. The iGroove works perfectly, and sound is very good. Easy to set up and use. Only complaint is that I like a little more bass, but compared to other similar speaker systems, this one is very good. It's hard to beat Klipsch speakers.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch iGroove SXT 30-Pin ipod/iphone Speaker Dock
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Klipsch iGroove for almost 3 years now. I am a massage therapist and music is not just a nicety, it is a necessity. I have a home space out of which I massage as well as an office space. I finally ordered another Klipsch iGroove because every time I went to the space that did not have it, the music sounded like it was coming out of a tin can. The iGroove surrounds you in music and is really impressive for such a small docking station. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Waid

customer_reviews.title: can't say anything better than that for she is a School Administrator for ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and uses it almost daily..... can't say anything better than that for she is a School Administrator for several schools and this helps her get through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Could have been better with bass as the bass is little low but overall a good docking station for the price and the size. 1 more point about the placeholder for ipod. I have ipod nano but taking out and in using the attachment placeholder is a pain. So, I simply removed the attachment and placed the ipod directly, its a small problem but still is a problem. I would rate this product 3.5 out of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Bits

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: To begin, the product worked great, sounded great, looked great, but quit working after a year. No problem, there is a two year warranty, right? Wrong! The seller, Founder Direct, has a 30 day return policy, after this, you're screwed. Why? Because Founder Direct is not an authorized reseller of Klipsch products. After being denied a return by Founder Direct, I went to the Klipsch website, where they have a huge list of unauthorized resellers, and guess who is on there? Right again, Founder Direct. Too bad I found out the hard way. Great product if it doesn't break after the first 30 days. Still love Amazon, they're great!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Harris

customer_reviews.title: Expecting a lot and I got it.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a lot from this speaker dock and I was still floored By the rich, powerful sound. Since I got more than I bargained for in the sound, it is easy to overlook the lack of portability (not battery operated). But if you are looking for rich clear powerful sound while charging your iPhone or iPod these speakers will do The job.
customer_reviews.author: Richh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: I gave this system the acid test of filling my 525 sq ft great room with sound. The results were excellent, even playing internet radio streaming through my Touch. I have tried a variety of music, and I've experienced a nice, rich sound with no noticeable distortion. I feel it compares favorably to the Bose dock at a much lower price. It's light weight, easy to move from one room to another.
customer_reviews.author: TheEmpress

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound from this speaker dock. It's the first one I've used, so I don't have a comparison, but I do like it. I bought this one because of all the good reviews from others who sound like they know what they are talking about. I keep it in the kitchen and, even when I'm not using the speakers, I pop my phone in it to charge. It's more convenient than plugging in the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!!
customer_reviews.text: My familyl just loves this player! It is complexity free and it hasn't given us a single issue in the 5 weeks we've had it. We use it everyday in our 14x25' kitchen and has smooth compatibility with my iPhone4 and my husbands Nano's. The sound meets my husbands base approval which isnt easy to get. Go for this, 2 thumbs up :D
customer_reviews.author: 4luck2d

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch delivers quality sound for a fraction of the cost of what you will spend on the overrated Bose sounddock. I own both and for the average listener Bose is over-priced and underachieving. If you want to spend the extra money...go for it...if not the Klipsch will suffice just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Delancie M. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound For Its Size
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great for its size and cost! I use it in my loft and it fills the room. Even at low volume, you can still hear some good base. When I cranked it, there was no distortion. I looked at the B&W Zeppelin but did not want to spend that kind of money for what I wanted to use this for. Bottom line, this really produces surprisingly good sound for its size and cost! The remote works great and is very simple. My main system is Marantz/Paradigm and I use high end Kimber speaker wire and interconnects for my 300w power amp. I know what good is and this Klipsch is good for what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Big T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great sound...........great price for this sound quality......just purchased a second one for work.......is small, slender, sleek.....and bought an adapter for it for only 25. which allows it to charge both my Iphone 4, and husband's Iphone4s...........
customer_reviews.author: sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from small unit
customer_reviews.text: Ipod Dock has beautiful sharp sound quality at mid to high volumes. Perhaps not quite as sharp when used for back ground noise but still exceeds my expectations and always suprises me how full of a sound is being produced from such a small speaker system. The dock charges and plays both my iphone 3GS and wifes iphone 4 with out having to remove thier cases.
customer_reviews.author: S .Heys

customer_reviews.title: now i-groove too
customer_reviews.text: This little unit puts out a quality of sound you can't believe. I notice sounds I've never heard before on familiar songs even on headphones. I took it to my bro's house to compair it to his Ipod dock's, he has 3. The only one in the same league was 3 times as big and twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: swan

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price this or JBL 200iD skip the Bose
customer_reviews.text: I have a JBL 200iD which is nice. I was thinking of a Bose Portable dock, but at $450 it seem very expensive. None of the battery powered units have much base. I have a Logitech unit which is clear but lack base and volume. For $150 get this or the JBL i200D both sound really good. Mark W
customer_reviews.author: Mark w

customer_reviews.title: "Amazon Verified Purchase" & Klipsch iGroove SXT Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Klipsch iGroove SXT speaker for my iPod from Amazon. Was very satisfied with Amazon & how quickly I received my product after placing the order. The sound from the Klipsch iGroove SXT speaker is awesome, & amazing coming from such a small unit. I purchaed this speaker so I could take it with me when we travel south for the winter & needed something small, compact & great sounding. This speaker is just what I was looking for & I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - great price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need for my iPod while working from home.
customer_reviews.author: James McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, sparse remote controls
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to listen to my iPod while working away from my main sound system. The Klipsch has great sound and really fills the room. My only complaint is the remote controls are limited. I couldn't move between play lists using the remote - I had to go to the unit and use the controls on the iPod. Not a tragedy, just a missing benefit of an otherwise great value. I paid under $140 and think it sounds as good as the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Barnet Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Little box, big sound.
customer_reviews.text: Researched this one a long time before buying for my son. Reviews I read compared it favorably to Bose, but of course for much less $$. What was essential for me is that it has a stereo input for connecting non-Apple products. Only drawback is that the remote (naturally) doesn't work with non-Apple products. Bottom line: the system is smaller than I expected and sounds better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jed B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got it used. Great sound, great size, easy to use and easy to transport
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: warning...not happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: Volume doesn't stay the same, power off at times😈 Love the size, the speaker sounds good but product quality is questionable!
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: I had problems with the remote
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good. However, after a few days the remote stopped working. I got a 2-pack of new batteries for it. Still didn't work. Then my wife tried the third battery and it worked! I don't think I got two bad batteries, counting the original. I think the connection inside the remote is faulty. Also, I see no way to control playlists with the remote. Maybe I'm just dumb. But I don't want to use the selector wheel on my iPod, because as others have said, the dock connector appears flimsy and I don't want to stress it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H. Price Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with iPhone 4s
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 4s does not work with this unit, I pushed down hard on the unit - did not want to break it. BTW, my iPhone 4s works perfectly well with an older iHome docking unit. My older (deactivated)iPhone 3gs does work with the Klipsch, sound is reasonable although bass is kinda thin. I bought this unit to use in my office where myself and my coworkers almost all own 4's or 4s's, so this is a non-starter. I noticed that the box has a picture of a 3GS on it, should have guessed... Disappointing - Amazon's product description should clearly indicate the limitations of this model.
customer_reviews.author: Subman

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am a person that does not skimp when it comes to purchasing audio and video equipment. I have purchased yamaha, infinity, JBL, and alpine just to name a few. I do however still like to get the best bang for my buck and let me say that the Klipsch iGrove SXT is just that. Don't wast your money on more expensive units, you won't be able to tell the difference. The sound from this unit has just the right amount of bass and gives a rich sound that is extremely impressive. You don't have to remove your case to dock your iPhone, what a plus. Don't listen to the negative reviews purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: ToddA

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch iGroove
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it on the recommendation of a friend. I was blown away by the sound quality. Excellent! Works with both my Touch and Nano. Remote is easy to use. Small package that sits in a corner of a counter or desk and takes up very little space, but produces a roomful of sound.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for iPhone4
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the iGroove SXT as a gift for my wife's birthday and she loves it! I read that some products, although marked 'Ok with iPhone4', were still causing issues, but we have not had any. I was quite surprised at how small the unit was and even more surprised when we turned it on! Nice! Things I would have liked: - multiple plug adaptors for international users (we're in New Zealand and had to purchase an international adaptor) - volume indicator - there's no way of telling what the volume setting is Happy customer! Niyaaz
customer_reviews.author: Niyaaz

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive remote control but everything else is satisfactory
customer_reviews.author: clarence would like to cnange the delivery address to 2654 wildberry ct edison New Jersey 08817

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st experience with a Klipsch product. So far (I have only had this for about a month) I am more than satisfied with the player. The sound quality is very good, the controls, both remote as well as built in work as you would expect and it is compact enough to take anywhere. The price was fair for the quality of the product. I went to a box store to listen to a variety of players and other than the Bose which was considerably higher in price I thought this was the best. Some suggestions would be to add a radio and offer rechargeable batteries with optional Ipod charge when in battery mode.
customer_reviews.author: tom brodeur

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Quality for the Price!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife's birthday and couldn't be happier w/ the results!! I decided to purchase this instead of forking over a ton of $$ for a BOSE and am SO GLAD that I went w/ the Klipsch. The sound is Vibrant and plenty loud enough for the rooms she plays it in (Kitchen and our Bedroom). The bass surprised us given how compact the unit is. The only complaint we have is you have to be careful when docking/undocking the iPhone b/c the back of the phone doesn't rest flush w/ the unit (but that wouldn't keep me from purchasing another one). A solid A product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Love my iGroove
customer_reviews.text: This is not your normal iPhone/iPod dock. This thing is amazing!!! I bought one about two years ago and my wife liked it so much I had to buy her one for her side of the bed. It produces a full range of sound that serious music lovers can appreciate. I liked this product so much I purchased all Klipsch speakers for my entire house.
customer_reviews.author: usn020702

AMAZON.COM
While many iPod speakers fall into the dime-a-dozen category, the iGroove SXT iPod Speaker System, with iPhone certification, definitely does not. In fact, this sleek, pint-sized powerhouse fits perfectly into any room, while making your playlists larger than life.

Sleek style and performance prowess. Click to enlarge.

Shielded from cell phone interference to prevent unwanted noise. 

The original iGroove SXT, introduced in 2007, turned a lot of heads with its sleek style and performance prowess. This latest version takes that success to a whole new level, without costing a penny more. It sounds better than ever and accommodates all of the new iPod and iPhone models, even the iPhone 3G S. 

Technology
The iGroove SXT remains a true stereo sound system that employs dual long-throw 2.5-inch woofers in a ported enclosure and dual 3/4-inch horn-loaded tweeters. Klipsch is the only company in the iPod speaker category to utilize horn technology, a design that delivers lifelike sound as well as produces more output using less energy. The result? Huge stereo sound from a pint-sized package. 

And unlike before, the iGroove SXT is now bi-amplified, which means each driver is individually amplified, a feature that virtually eliminates distortion and significantly improves sonic performance. Klipsch also re-tuned the bass ports on the sides of the system to remove any "port noise." 

In addition, the amplifier is shielded from cell phone interference, so you can forget about unwanted noise when you've got an iPhone docked. 

iPod/iPhone Compatibility
The iGroove SXT charges any iPod with a 30-pin connector, while the shuffle and other digital devices connect via a rear auxiliary input. Klipsch added a 1000mA rapid charge circuit to the system, so you can quickly recharge your iPod, iPod touch or iPhone. 

For video-enabled iPods and iPhones, an S-video output lets you watch videos on external monitors. 

Finally, need an alarm clock? Combine your iPod's alarm clock feature with the iGroove SXT. 

What's in the Box
iGroove SXT, IR Remote, Power Adapter, Power Cord
